content: **one** piece no sewing **two** colors **three** sizes in these quick-to-knit slippers for women compact enough to tuck in your bag or pocket and take with you anywhere this is a nice small portable project for traveling or for warm-weather knitting you can use up stash and ball ends as they are very quick to complete you ll have a basket filled with holiday gifts or charity donations in no time the slippers are worked from the center of the foot around up to the cuff judy s magic cast on is used to start the sole the instep is shaped with short row you can use any technique for knitting in the round that you like but i find that magic loop works well with this project this is a nice small project on which to learn these techniques if they are new to you
